'''Abductive Reasoning''' is [[Alhaitham]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When Alhaitham possesses at least one Chisel-Light Mirror, his Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks are [[Elemental Conversion|converted]] into {{Color|Dendro DMG}} and can also cause Projection Attacks, as described in the description of [[Universality: An Elaboration on Form]].

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|1|Four-Causal Correction|character=Alhaitham|talent=Abductive Reasoning}}
